text: Hi, does anyone know if there is a way to tell if you are in the content editor in HubSpot. something like `request.HubSpoteditor` for example? Thanks

Hey everyone. Question:
If I create a page using DnD modules and fill the page with content (text, images, CTAs, etc.), is there a way to extract the generated page as a template? So that it will display the `{% dnd_section %}` and all `{% dnd_module path="<path>" %}`  setup with the selected values? I've built a few with Hubl to set defaults for DnD templates, but this would be much quicker. Thanks.
I donâ€™t think there is a way to do this yet - but it would be pretty dope!
Would make me a happy man, for sure.
